## Python

```{python, engine.path = "~/anaconda3/bin/python"}
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import statsmodels.api as sm

table = np.asarray([[35, 21], [25, 58]])
t22 = sm.stats.Table2x2(table.T)
print(t22)
print(t22.summary())
print(t22.test_nominal_association())
```
